products.name: Training: Building Secure API's and Web Applications

metadata.description: The major cause of API and web application insecurity is a lack of secure software development knowledge and practices. This highly intensive and interactive 1-day workshop provides essential application security training for web application and API developers. This workshop is a combination of lecture, security testing, and code review. Presented by Jim Manico

products.name: Training: DevSecOps - Automate Security in DevOps

metadata.description: Code gets shipped into a DevOps environment at a blazing speed, making it extremely difficult to address security at each new release.In this training we shall discuss how to address security issues by automating security in a DevOps environment utilising various tools and techniques. Attendees will also get a DevSecOps-Lab used during the course. Presented by Rohit Salecha
